attachments.title: Pentagram’s Emily Oberman brands Snoop Dogg’s new line of weed products
attachments.text: Pentagram partner Emily Oberman has crafted the identity for Snoop Dogg’s new line of cannabis-based products called "Leafs by Snoop":<http://www.leafsbysnoop.com>. Adopting a “laid-back California cool” aesthetic for the rapper and ganja lover’s range, a leaf motif features throughout. A mix of pastel gold colours and imagery like palm trees, fish, birds and cloudy skies completes the sunny identity.
attachments.fallback: It&#8217;s Nice That: Pentagram’s Emily Oberman brands Snoop Dogg’s new line of weed products

text: i always question if this much effort is actually put into the final product you’d get on shelves.
I’m also not used to seeing things I consider “good” from pentagram.
